item.title: Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplaceable being." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Love is the ultimate outlaw. It just won't adhere to any rules. The most any of us can do is to sign on as its accomplice. Instead of vowing to honor and obey, maybe we should swear to aid and abet. That would mean that security is out of the question. The words "make" and "stay" become inappropriate. My love for you has no strings attached. I love you for free." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There are only two mantras, yum and yuck, mine is yum." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There is no such thing as a weird human being, It's just that some people require more understanding than others." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "The function of the artist is to provide what life does not." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "As a child, I was an imaginary playmate." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "I have always been a romantic; one of those who believes that a woman in pink circus tights holds all the secrets of the world." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Hello babies. Welcome to Earth. It's hot in the summer and cold in the winter. It's round and wet and crowded. On the outside, babies, you've got a hundred years here. There's only one rule that I know of, babies-"God damn it, you've got to be kind." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "The universe is a big place, perhaps the biggest." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Daphne Rae
item.description: "I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love." -- Daphne Rae

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We've all been raised on television to believe that one day we'd all be millionaires, and movie gods, and rock stars. But we won't. And we're slowly learning that fact. And we're very, very pissed off." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Jeanne Ray
item.description: "A slice of cake never made anyone fat. You don't eat the whole cake. You don't eat a cake every day of your life. You take the cake when it is offered because the cake is delicious. You have a slice of cake and what it reminds you of is someplace that's safe, uncomplicated, without stress. A cake is a party, a birthday, a wedding. A cake is what is served on the happiest days of your life." -- Jeanne Ray

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Wendy Mass
Denaya add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Our lives are not as limited as we think they are; the world is a wonderfully weird place; consensual reality is significantly flawed; no institution can be trusted, but love does work; all things are possible; and we all could be happy and fulfilled if we only had the guts to be truly free and the wisdom to shrink our egos and quit taking ourselves so damn seriously." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Sri S. Satchidananda
item.description: "We are not going to change the whole world, but we can change ourselves and feel free as birds. We can be serene even in the midst of calamities and, by our serenity, make others more tranquil. Serenity is contagious. If we smile at someone, he or she will smile back. And a smile costs nothing. We should plague everyone with joy. If we are to die in a minute, why not die happily, laughing? (136-137)" -- Sri S. Satchidananda

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Yoga is the effort to experience one's divinity personally and then to hold on to that experience forever." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Patanjali
item.description: "For those who have an intense urge for Spirit and wisdom, it sits near them, waiting." -- Patanjali

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Sri Swami Satchidananda
item.description: "When you win and the other fellow loses, what do you see? A losing face. There is great joy in losing and making the other person win and have a happy face. Who will be the happiest person? The one who brings happiness to others." -- Sri Swami Satchidananda

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Swami Vivekananda
item.description: "Neither seek nor avoid, take what comes." -- Swami Vivekananda

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Swami Vivekananda
item.description: "We are responsible for what we are, and whatever we wish ourselves to be, we have the power to make ourselves. If what we are now has been the result of our own past actions, it certainly follows that whatever we wish to be in the future can be produced by our present actions; so we have to know how to act." -- Swami Vivekananda

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Amit Ray
item.description: "We all are so deeply interconnected; we have no option but to love all. Be kind and do good for any one and that will be reflected. The ripples of the kind heart are the highest blessings of the Universe." -- Amit Ray

item.title: Denaya add a quote by Prem Prakash
item.description: "The yogi can relate to his Beloved in the form of a personal relationship-as a friend, a child, a spouse. He can cherish God in traditional religious performances–honoring saints, holy sites, and scriptures. He can hold God dear in the form of union—as his own Self, or in samadhi. All forms of God are equally suitable for love. (165)" -- Prem Prakash
